item.title: Reading Notes of Paper
item.description: Request sequence generation of VM Article title Generating Complex, Realistic Cloud Workloads using Recurrent Neural Networks Author and organization Shane Bergsma (Huawei Canada Research Center), Timothy Zeyl (Huawei Canada Research Center), Arik Senderovich (University of Toronto), J. Christopher Beck (University of Toronto) Problems solved by the article To predict the load of virtual machines dynamically created by users on the cloud, a Cloud Workload can be simply regarded as a Trace of VMs created by users.
